## ng-app-live package

Module that contains a default configuration to run an [Angular](https://angular.io/) application against [Acoustic Content](https://www.ibm.com/products/watson-content-hub) in view mode.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WchNgAppLiveModule](./ng-app-live.wchngapplivemodule.md) | Imports the modules required for live functionality |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [VERSION](./ng-app-live.version.md) | Version and build number of the package |
